docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: AT the turn of the century, when ''botanizing'' was a popular pastime, dozens of naturalists spent countless hours collecting and identifying lichens, unusual unions of algae and fungi forming picturesque plants that resemble neither ''parent.''

headline.main: Is the Air Pure or Foul? Lichens Can Tell the Tale

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Responding to a spate of attacks on New Yorkers by pit bulls, Mayor Koch proposed yesterday to ban the sale or possession of the dogs in the city.

headline.main: Koch Offers Bill to Ban Sale And Possession of Pit Bulls

docs.snippet: LEAD: Responding to a spate of attacks on New Yorkers by pit bulls, Mayor Koch proposed yesterday to ban the sale or possession of the dogs in the city.
